name: Push The Button - Version 2
description:
All you need to do is to push a button how hard can that be! ;) Push The Button is a short walking sim game, created for the DATT 4300 game jam.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

The theme for this part of the game jam is Emotion The emotion we chosen for this game jam project is ANNOYANCE

Push The Button is one of the 4 games that we have to make for this game jam 

 

Members: 

Matthew Wang (Programming, Level Designer)

Daniel Rios (Programmer, Narrator voice actor)

Joseph Yong (Programmer, Level Designer, narrator voice actor) 

Sayid Allie (Shader and texture Artist) 

Rayjay (Programming, Level Designer)

Shaiyan Azim (Artist)

Credits:

SFX by mixkit, newagesoup (Freesound), deathscyp (Freesound), alexdiaz12 (Freesound), kayrabey07 (Freesound), skyko (Freesound), wubitog (Freesound)

Trophy model by David Oreilly (Everything library furnishings)

Mini First Person Controller by Simon Pasi
